Class BoardDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spring.project.board.dao.BoardDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoardDAO

    @Repository
public class BoardDAOImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements BoardDAO
    BoardDAO의 구현체
    게시물 테이블과 관련된 CRUD를 처리한다.
    Author:
    adm
